title: Well-Being Exploration Through Art: Online Teacher Capacity Building Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of artistic activities and educational field experience
context.additional_context: Exploring methods to enhance well-being through artistic activities in an asynchronous smartphone-based learning environment, while developing creative pedagogical approaches applicable to real educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three well-being practices that utilize artworks.
Learners can design educational plans reflecting a trauma-informed approach.
Learners can collaborate with peers to plan and execute creative projects on the theme of well-being.
Learners can document in a reflective journal how art-based activities impact their own and othersâ€™ well-being.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
